name: SnowyDay
description:
(Due to a glitch you have to grapple the ground at the start in order to beat the game)

IDEALLY PLAY IN FULLSCREEN

Note: Really buggy because of unity Export :((

Controls:

-AD: Movement

-Space: Jump

-Left Click: Attack towards mouse

-Right-Click: Hold to grapple hook towards mouse, let go to let go

Other Features:

-When you take damage you go into a 'crippled state'

-To regain hp and leave this state you must grapple onto a buried power core in the level
